short_description: SQL/MR function to train a ner model.
long_description: SQL/MR function to train a ner model.

input_tables.description: The relation that contains the training data.

argument_clauses.name: Domain
argument_clauses.description: The address of the Queen. The host parameter is the Aster Database Queenâ€™s IP saddress or hostname.

argument_clauses.name: Database
argument_clauses.description: The name of the database where the input table is located.

argument_clauses.name: UserId
argument_clauses.description: The Aster Database user name of the user running this function.

argument_clauses.name: Password
argument_clauses.description: The Aster Database password of the user.

argument_clauses.name: SSLSettings
argument_clauses.description: A string that includes all the SSL settings, except the password for the truststore.

argument_clauses.name: SSLTrustStorePassword
argument_clauses.description: The password for the SSL truststore.

argument_clauses.name: TextColumn
argument_clauses.description: The name of the column whose content is analyzed

argument_clauses.name: Language
argument_clauses.description: The language used in the input text (language_type). The supported values are: 'en' | 'zh_CN' | 'zh_TW'. The default is 'en' The permitted input values are [en, zh_CN, zh_TW]. The default value is en.

argument_clauses.name: ModelFile
argument_clauses.description: The name of the model file to be generated

argument_clauses.name: Eta
argument_clauses.description: The tolerance of the termination criterion. Defines the differences of the values of the loss function between two sequential epochs. The default value is '0.0001' The default value is 1.0E-4.

argument_clauses.name: MaxIterNum
argument_clauses.description: The maximum number of iterations. The default value is '1000' The input value must be greater than 0. The default value is 1000.

argument_clauses.name: MinOccurNum
argument_clauses.description: The number of feature occurrences in the text above which a feature is used to construct the model. The default value is '0' The default value is 0.

argument_clauses.name: FeatureTemplate
argument_clauses.description: The name of the template file that, when training a CRFs model, tells the function how to generate features

argument_clauses.name: ExtractorJar
argument_clauses.description: The name of the JAR file that contains the Java classes that extract features
